summary: A man who has been having visions of an impending danger begins an affair with a woman who may lead him to his doom.
cast: Jeroen Krabbé|Renée Soutendijk|Thom Hoffman|Dolf de Vries|Geert de Jong|Hans Veerman|Hero Muller|Caroline de Beus|Reinout Bussemaker|Erik J. Meijer|Ursul de Geer|Filip Bolluyt|Hedda Lornie|Paul Nygaard|Guus van der Made|Pamela Teves|Hella Faassen|Helen Hedy
title: El cuarto hombre
